Docs.summary: API for implementing new Zeroconf/mDNS providers, such as Bonjour and Avahi.

remarks.para: Zeroconf providers for Mono.Zeroconf are written as plugins. Provider assemblies are loaded at runtime by Mono.Zeroconf.
Each provider must implement a plugin "entry point" by implementing , providing classes that implement interfaces from , and applying the assembly level attribute, to the provider assembly.
